description: 26-01-2016 Is it legal to record your spouse on a phone call without their knowledge? Under the Texas penal code, it is a crime to intercept or record any wire, oral, or electronic communication. Tex. Penal Code  16.02, and Tex. Civ. Prac. & Rem. Code, Ch. 123 create both criminal and civil causes of action for wiretapping phone conversation.
